name: Kao the Kangaroo (GBA)
description: Kidnapped from the Outback, KAO must find his way back to his beautiful Australian home. Armed with comedy-size boxing gloves, our hero will have to run, bounce and triple-jump his way through 27 colorful & cartoony levels: SNOWBOARDING, FLYING and JET SKIING as he goes. With 16 different enemy types to overcome, he's going to need help.
